variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject identifier [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Contact occasion [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA1
variable.description: 1. Have you ever consumed alcoholic beverages? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]
variable.value: Stopped drinking more than one year ago

variable.name: ADRA2A
variable.description: 2a. During the past 12 months, on the average, how many days per week, month, or year did you drink any alcoholic beverage? Number of days [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA2B
variable.description: 2b. During the past 12 months, on the average, how many days per week, month, or year did you drink any alcoholic beverage? Per-unit of time week/month/year [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA3
variable.description: 3. On average, on the days that you drank alcohol, how many drinks [by a drink, I mean a 12-ounce beer, a four-ounce glass of wine, or an ounce of liquor] did you have a day? Number of drinks [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA4
variable.description: 4. When you drink, do you usually drink beer, wine, or liquor? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA5
variable.description: 5. Was there ever a time or times in you life when you drank 5 or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day? [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA6
variable.description: 6. Used crack or cocaine in any form [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA7
variable.description: 7. How many times have you used crack/cocaine in your life [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]

variable.name: ADRA8
variable.description: 8. Use of any other drug [Visit 1] [Health Practices: Alcohol and Drug Use, Version A]
